message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
I understand that $200 might be a stretch, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we discuss a price of $175?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $137.50?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a decent profit. How about we meet at $155?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $145?
I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $152?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $148?
I'm getting close to my minimum price. How about we meet at $150?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to get the best deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $147?
